A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is one to think about.  I personally found it to be a very welcomed departure from the norm. Yes this movie is different than anything they have done so far. But it's about time to break the mold.  In a universe as expansive as Star Wars\, to not be able to go into new territory\, will make it stale. While maybe not perfect\, and no movie ever is\, this was one of the best in the series.  It will keep you guessing as to what's going to happen\, because you will be surprised.
